description: The QID segment contains the information necessary to uniquely identify a query. Its primary use is in query cancellation or subscription cancellation.

1.name: Query Tag
1.description: This field identifies the instance of a query.

2.name: Message Query Name
2.description: This field contains the name of the query. These names are assigned by the function-specific chapters of this specification. Site-specific query names begin with the letter Z. Refer to User defined table 0471 - Query name for suggested values.
